name: datapack
description: A high-performance JavaScript library for packing and unpacking binary data with a schema-based approach. Optimized for both Node.js and browser environments, datapack provides a simple and efficient way to serialize and deserialize complex data structures.

scripts.build: rm -rf lib && tsc && cp README.md lib/ && cp package.json lib/package.json
scripts.release: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
